targets.query: SELECT last("jnxBoxDescr") AS "Product Family", last("jnxBoxSerialNo") AS "Serial Number", last("uptime") AS "Uptime" FROM "snmp_snmp" WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT last("bgpPeerState") AS "state" FROM "snmp_bgp_statistics" WHERE ("bgpPeerRemoteAddr" =~ /^$neighbors$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$HOSTNAME$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "bgpPeerRemoteAddr" fill(null)

SELECT last("bgpPeerState") AS "state" FROM "snmp_bgp_statistics" WHERE ("bgpPeerRemoteAddr" =~ /^$neighbors$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$HOSTNAME$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "bgpPeerRemoteAddr" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_interfaces_statistics" with KEY = "hostname"
list.label: Device
list.name: HOSTNAME
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_interfaces_statistics" with KEY = "hostname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_interfaces_statistics" with KEY = "ifName"
list.label: Interface(s)
list.name: ifName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_interfaces_statistics" with KEY = "ifName"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_bgp_statistics" with KEY = "bgpPeerRemoteAddr"
list.label: BGP Neighbor(s)
list.name: neighbors
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "snmp_bgp_statistics" with KEY = "bgpPeerRemoteAddr"
